content: Yes, I can’t imagine what he would have done to recieve the wrath. He was always civil in what I read — though often direct with his opinions, which isn’t a bad thing at all. Maybe he deleted his account himself. Not sure, just weird. I’d hope not though. I didn’t always agree with him, but he did offer a different voice on this platform. Medium needs many voices. *sigh* Anyway, Happy Easter Meg! Hope you have a great day.
